scripts.dev:sequential: npm run server & sleep 5 && npm run client
scripts.dev:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build:prod: cd client && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

scripts.setup:prod: npm install --only=production && cd server && npm install --only=production && cd ../client && npm install
